alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:49PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 349 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Yoder to near Truckton to Hanover to 8 miles north of Pinon. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fountain, Hanover, Truckton, Yoder and Pinon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
